pinyin: zai4 sheng1 bu4 liang2 xing4 pin2 xue4
lian2 dao1 xi4 bao1 pin2 xue4
lian2 xing2 xue4 qiu2 pin2 xue4 zheng4

sentences.english: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.chinese: 血红素或球蛋白的正常产生收到干扰会导致贫血。

sentences.english: If it is caused by anaemia you might have to start taking iron tablets.
sentences.chinese: 如果是所造成的贫血，你也可能开始采取铁片。

sentences.english: Symptoms of anaemia include general fatigue and lassitude.
sentences.chinese: 贫血症状包括全身疲劳和困乏。

sentences.english: The cure of congenital aplastic anemia and general again block is same.
sentences.chinese: 先天性再生障碍性贫血的治疗与一般再障相同。

sentences.english: We report an unusual case of inflammatory fibroid polyp presenting with chronic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个以贫血为表现的炎性纤维息肉的病例。

sentences.english: Pregnant rats iron deficiency anemia can affect their fetus growth.
sentences.chinese: 结论母鼠缺铁性贫血可影响仔鼠生长发育。

sentences.english: The doctor diagnosed her illness as anaemia.
sentences.chinese: 医生诊断她的病是贫血症。

sentences.english: Because of this, there have been claims that vegetarians are more at risk of iron-deficiency anaemia than non-vegetarians.
sentences.chinese: 因此，素食者比非素食都更容易患缺铁性贫血。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic outcomes of anemia by means of invigorating the kidney, reinforcing spleen and generating blood.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨补肾健脾生血法治疗贫血的疗效。

sentences.english: Babesiosis can cause hemolytic anemia in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 巴贝斯虫病能引起犬只的溶血性贫血。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical features of senile megaloblastic anemia and its misdiagnosing cause.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年人巨幼细胞贫血的临床特点及误诊原因。

sentences.english: Is my blood depress slight and anaemic can you donate blood?
sentences.chinese: 我血压低轻微贫血能献血么？

sentences.english: Iron-deficiency anemia can lead to a pale color along with a thin, brittle, ridged texture.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁性贫血会导致苍白的颜色和薄，脆，纵横条纹。

sentences.english: Iron deficiency can cause anaemia resulting from low levels of haemoglobin in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁可导致贫血导致低水平的血红蛋白在血液中。

sentences.english: Iron deficiency anaemia is extremely common both in the UK and worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁性贫血在英国及世界各地都极其普遍。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between atrophic glossitis and megalocytic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨萎缩性舌炎与大细胞性贫血的关系。

definition: hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白
